Table.name: SMDNP
Table.sql: SELECT (SELECT ISNULL(LTRUCK_NO,'')+';' FROM SMRV WHERE SMRV.SHIPMENT_ID=SMBD.SHIPMENT_ID FOR XML PATH('')) AS LTRUCK_NO, (SELECT ISNULL(LDRIVER,'')+';' FROM SMRV WHERE SMRV.SHIPMENT_ID=SMBD.SHIPMENT_ID FOR XML PATH('')) AS LDRIVER, SMSM.PKG_UNIT AS PKG_UNIT_UB,SMSM.PKG_NUM,SMSM.PKG_UNIT,SMSM.PKG_UNIT_DESC, SMBD.TRAN_TYPE,SMSM.POD_CD AS POD_CD,SMSM.POD_NAME AS POD_NM,SMBD.SHIPMENT_ID,SMBD.DN_NO,SMSM.POL_CD, SMSM.POL_NAME,SMBDD.*,SMRV.TRUCKER,SMRV.TRUCKER_NM,SMRV.CNTR_NO,SMRV.SEAL_NO1 FROM SMBD LEFT JOIN SMSM ON SMBD.SHIPMENT_ID = SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID LEFT JOIN SMBDD ON SMBD.SHIPMENT_ID = SMBDD.SHIPMENT_ID LEFT JOIN SMRV ON SMBD.SHIPMENT_ID = SMRV.SHIPMENT_ID WHERE SMSM.:=field=':=val'

Table.name: PARTY
Table.sql: SELECT * FROM SMSMPT LEFT JOIN SMPTY ON SMSMPT.PARTY_NO=SMPTY.PARTY_NO WHERE SMSMPT.:=field=':=val'
